comments.author: Hatchy
comments.body: Op, you should have posted this on the meta board since it's related to the forum. Regarding your idea, there's no need to bring old threads back to the top when we can explore new ideas instead. Time moves forward, and there will always be new threads and fresh ideas to discuss, making it unnecessary to revive old ones. If any newbies or forum members are searching for past discussions, they can use the search bar or browse through the oldest pages to find what they're looking for.
